instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00045 does not connect, no consumption at source.
threads.message: This mac arrived dead, watch some videos on the internet and I verified that the u7100 and charge controller, I made the reflow on it and it worked again, but after some months the client came back with the same defect, I made the IC replacement, but it didn't work. I would like to know if it only works with new IC?

threads.title: 820-00045 does not connect, no consumption at source.
threads.message:
Where do you think to get "NEW" chip???
It doesn't exist...

You probably have a dead CPU now, like in all these f***g boards.
